channel.title: Command that increases your combat level
channel.description: Does anyone know a command that I can use to make my combat level higher, but have my stats be the same?

item.title: Command that increases your combat level
item.dc:creator: @timmarus1 timmarus1
item.description:
@timmarus1 wrote:

I’m sorry, I use allstar-Scape. And that doesn’t work, it give me an error.

Read full topic
item.source: Command that increases your combat level

item.title: Command that increases your combat level
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

I have that but it’s for a 317 delta, I don’t know what base your using because you didn’t tell us so I’ll post it anyway.

if(command.startsWith("combat") && playerRights >= 2){ int combat = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); extraCb += combat; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
The command works as follows: ::combat LVL

Read full topic
